description: Returns details about the specified configuration.

parameters.name: ConfigurationId
parameters.description: A service generated identifier for the configuration.

nested_items.name: Account
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account where the configuration was deployed.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationDefinitionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the configuration definition.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The datetime stamp when the configuration manager was created.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: A service generated identifier for the configuration.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedAt
nested_items.description: The datetime stamp when the configuration manager was last updated.

nested_items.name: ManagerArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the configuration manager.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: The parameters for the configuration definition type.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region where the configuration was deployed.

nested_items.name: StatusSummaries
nested_items.description: A summary of the state of the configuration manager. This includes deployment statuses, association statuses, drift statuses, health checks, and more.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The datetime stamp when the status was last updated.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status.

nested_items.name: StatusDetails
nested_items.description: Details about the status.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: When applicable, returns an informational message relevant to the current status and status type of the status summary object. We don't recommend implementing parsing logic around this value since the messages returned can vary in format.

nested_items.name: StatusType
nested_items.description: The type of a status summary.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the Quick Setup configuration.

nested_items.name: TypeVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the Quick Setup type used.
